Text: heres a tip,in prefs change from dolby to 3d stereo and everything is in sync.use vdub to extract the .ac3.also set mix surround =0,delay surround =0,main amplify 300-350 and tick high quality pcm conversion. great app for converting ac3 to 2ch stereo track.
well.. looks like I will be the first of 720 to say thanks.. Thanks man X0NE
